html:
ProvidersMoreFireworks
Fireworks

This page covers how to use Fireworks models within Langchain.

Installation and setup‚Äã

Install the Fireworks client library.

pip install fireworks-ai


Get a Fireworks API key by signing up at app.fireworks.ai.

Authenticate by setting the FIREWORKS_API_KEY environment variable.

Authentication‚Äã

There are two ways to authenticate using your Fireworks API key:

Setting the FIREWORKS_API_KEY environment variable.

os.environ["FIREWORKS_API_KEY"] = "<KEY>"


Setting fireworks_api_key field in the Fireworks LLM module.

llm = Fireworks(fireworks_api_key="<KEY>")

Using the Fireworks LLM module‚Äã

Fireworks integrates with Langchain through the LLM module. In this example, we will work the llama-v2-13b-chat model.

from langchain.llms.fireworks import Fireworks 

llm = Fireworks(
    fireworks_api_key="<KEY>",
    model="accounts/fireworks/models/llama-v2-13b-chat",
    max_tokens=256)
llm("Name 3 sports.")


For a more detailed walkthrough, see here.
